website_summaries.verdict: Budget-priced and easy-to-use, this is a great option for casual gamers.
pros: Hard to beat the price if you are just looking for a headset to chat with friends while you play
The audio is good enough to pick up footsteps of nearby players, and chat comes through clearly
cons: Not the best for high-quality gameplay audio

customer_reviews.title: The go to headphones for Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: These headphones seem like the go to headphones for Xbox one players because now a days every one I run across online has these. The sound quality is great for $30, the mic quality is great and can pick up the sound around you if you don't turn your mic settings down in the Xbox menu. I bought the black headphones sometime last year at Walmart and they still work. Just wanted white to match my white controller. I recommend this to any gamer who doesn't want to spend big money but want better quality headphones.
customer_reviews.author: FILNOBEP

customer_reviews.title: These work great sound is full bodied and somewhat nose cancelling as ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great sound is full bodied and somewhat nose cancelling as well. They are comfortable and durable. Will definitely purchase again if the need arises and will recommend. These were my 100% honest opinions feel free to take them or leave them :-) I DO hope this review was helpful and informative, If it was please let me know by clicking the helpful button. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica and Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Very clear
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones almost daily for playing Battlefield 1 and Overwatch. The sound is very clear so it's easy to hear light footsteps of players who are trying to sneak up. I haven't had any issues so far these headphones. I definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a new, inexpensive headset. You will not regret the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good basic headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my regular ps4 and it works perfectly. Sound is good.. loud, and has a good amount of bass. You can hear footsteps of enemy’s (depending on what game your playing obviously) and which direction they are coming from. The only thing about this headset is the microphone can only go on the left side of your head and the ear muffs are a bit slanted at a weird angle so they fit your head a little awkwardly. Other than that they are much lighter in weight than I expected and feel plasticy. They seem to be a great entry level headset for the average gamer
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Easy attachable headphone as well
customer_reviews.text: They are a solid pair of headphones no doubt. They give you full sound front, back, left and right on any shooter game. Easy attachable headphone as well. Would recommend buying these for casual gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset, For the price you cant go wrong, It has great sound quality with the 40mm speakers. Super easy setup just plug and play pretty much. I really like that the mic is removable, If I want to watch a movie I can just take the mic off and its out of the way. I would definitely recommend this head setup for a beginner headset.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works so well hearing not only the game, but I can use it for my iPad and phone to talk to others! It's so well crafted and no you do not need the Xbox One adapter that connects to the bottom of the controller. (If you have the earphone jack installed)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mic was especially good for something so inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second buy, bought my first one within days of getting my ps4 (got mine soon after launch). Served me well in CoD, mic was especially good for something so inexpensive. (Note to those buying one yourself, there is a notch in the mic that must line up the hole or your mic will drop off.)
customer_reviews.author: Raptor Man

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This was an X-mas gift for my grandson. It has already stopped working : ( I've been trying to see how to get a new one. Can't seem to find out how to go about it, or warranty. should have lasted more than 4 months. Sad grandson and grandma, Sylvia Avila
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Avila

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this headset on April 20th, arrived April 24th, started using them on April 25th and tonight while using them they just stopped working. To say I am upset is an understatement! I have bought this brand before and they lasted over a year but this set didn't even make it a month. I am not a religious gamer that uses them daily but I do use them several times a week and take good care of my stuff. I do not have the packaging to create a return and there is not a way to contact the seller other than to review the item. The microphone works but the headphones stopped working and I can't hear anything.
customer_reviews.author: Leighanne Love

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset👍 I have the xbox version and bought the PS4 version of the recon 50p for my god brother. He loved it. For the price it is a beyond amazon headset, I have recomended it to multiple friends. It plugs into the controller and even has a mute/volume control switch attached to the cord. When you mute tho it does make a pretty noticeable noise to the rest of your party and they can tell that you muted yourself. The headset is extremely light and comfortable and has leather ear pads. I could wear it for hours not even noticing it’s there. I use this headset more than I use my elite 800x
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Comfortable. The detachable mic is convenient if you want to use these as headphones or as a headset with the mic. Blocks outside sounds well. Surround sound effects so when you are moving around in your games you know what direction the other team is coming from. It also emphasizes the direction that you are turning or moving giving you a realistic feeling of being right in the middle of your game. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anglesey

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Not only do they work great for my xbox, but I also use them for work plugged into my cell phone for calls I want to mute and unmute quickly. I do tend to keep one side off my ears, however, because with them totally on you can't hear yourself talking and, as a result, tend to talk really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rando

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few months of use. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only a few months of use. This is the second headset from Turtle Beach I have purchased, and both stopped working after only a few months. Will try another brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: EriBax

customer_reviews.title: Mic does not stay plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Maybe we got a faulty unit, but our mic will NOT stay plugged in. The entire mic piece keeps falling out, the plug is way too loose and will not stay plugged in. It was kind of a pain to setup with my xbox and old controller (I was able to get the controller updated and get it working finally, thank you internet) but the mic is just poor quality build. Would not buy again, and because Kohls stores are all closed right now I'd have to pay to send it back and it's just a pain in the butt all around.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this gaming headphone and mic for have the ability to talk to my friends while playing on my Xbox One. Out of the box well packed and worked well when plugged into my Xbox Controller. Sound is clear, comfortable headset and ear coverings. Mic was a bit of a challenge getting my friends to hear me. Made a few adjustments and working fine now. For the price it’s a great deal. I own a pair of $100 gaming headphones but I get better sound and mic use.
customer_reviews.author: Tyee4me

customer_reviews.title: Conference Calls
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these for conference calls (vs. apple ear buds) and these are much more comfortable and the sound quality is great. I'm over 50 - like these for the home office (work from home)! Much better price point and value than traditional office head-sets.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: These headphones work a little to good, I wish they would break due to overuse.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for teenager, they were delivered quickly. The box was too sturdy because nothing was broken. The headphones have a volume adjuster to drone out every parents voice when talking about chores. The color is a bright white with a green neon perfect for never getting lost even when parents hide them under the bed. Also, a great microphone as all friends are able to communicate with the said gamer. I hope they break soon so teenager will stop gaming as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing headset. Sound quality is insane for the price
customer_reviews.text: amazing headset. Sound quality is insane for the price, comparable to my Plantronics headset that cost about 3 times as much. My son uses this for his Xbox One gaming, and wears it for hours a day without complaint (until I make him take a break but that complaint isn't the same). Microphone works well, same quality as the headset from what he says. I haven't been able to get it away from him yet to test it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kormath

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd set of these. Both have broke. First time was probably my fault as the tip that plugs into the controller broke off, I probably stepped on it. But the second time, the mic decided to stop working. It plugs in just fine and there’s nothing I’ve done, but it just bit the dust out of the blue. I’m in a party with my friend, he gets off to eat, so I unplug my mic until he gets back. When he returns, the system won’t pick up any of my audio. And of course this happens TWO DAYS after my return window closes.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Jones

customer_reviews.title: Now I can hear people creeping up on me
customer_reviews.text: These work really good for playing video games. I like the sound quality and the ability to hear the direction of the sounds origins. My girlfriend like not having to hear machine guns in the living room. My only issue is that these headphones won't work with my rechargeable controller battery pack. They only work when I put AA batteries in my controller. The rechargeable pack may not have enough current for both devices.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie L Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset.
customer_reviews.text: This is the headset you're looking for. I have been through many headsets, from the xbox branded stuff to other economy style versions like the sades models. Neither holds up to the quality that Turtle Beach delivers, and this model still provides the affordability. I bought one for myself over a year ago and just bought one for my brother and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Q

customer_reviews.title: Big Letdown Compared to Other Models
customer_reviews.text: Originally would have been 4 stars, but dropped to 2. I bought these Feb 10, 2019. It's now Feb 1, 2020, and they just died. Since day one, they would cut out from time to time. They've never been dropped. They've been treated very well. Was playing a game when they just died. All sound dissapeared, and it only pops when plugging them in and unplugging them. Mic was clear and had good quality for everyone else and I could hear them well.
customer_reviews.author: Day Yandle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! This is my second pair of turtle Beach headphones I've purchased in the past two years. I get a lot of compliments on how clear my mic sounds and always have people asking me which headset I have. They're comfortable and have great sound quality for just $30! I'm sure there are way better headsets out there if you have the cash but if you don't want to spend a fortune I'd highly recommend these as a cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Beach headphones. My son and his cousin have been raving for these for so long. Now it is their birthdays and I gave them to them. The house is quiet now. There is a volume control on the wire that plugs into the controllers. The mic was a little tricky. You need to line up the slot on the opening with the part that sticks out to get the mic to stay in. If you don't line theses up, the mic will swivel and continue to fall out. When in doubt, read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: howardh

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a relative and I understand from him that it has been a great gift. Just what he wanted and is doing just what is expected from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A.

customer_reviews.title: My son is very disappointed, quit working after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: My son begged me to order these on Prime Day. He said he had issues from the beginning with the sound cutting out but they just quit working altogether after only 2 weeks! When he plugs them into the controller they are no longer recognized and there is no sound or mic. Very disappointing purchase and we no longer have the box to return unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for more than a few games comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Everything good except one thing....my ears aren't even that big and after a few games my ears hurt. :( Update - (7 months later, it still works great!) Other than my ears getting chafed, Everything is working fine. I use mine everyday and just set it done. Don't know why so many reviews say they break after a couple months or the mic stops working. I'm happy with my purchase and even bought a second set for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Wickedmaryjane

customer_reviews.title: Is not made to last, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had this headset for less than 2 months. Over the course of a week, my friends would tell me in games there was a loud buzzing noise. To see if it was my controller, I tried my old cheap headset and had no issue. Finally about 4 minutes ago, the plug that goes into my Xbox controller got stuck in it and became separated from the mic itself. I have the feeling This product is not meant to last and for the price is a damn shame it doesn’t. I have nothing but bad experiences with title beach products in the past and shame on me for giving it one last try. Will not be buying turtle beach again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Minor touches, but sound quality is worth it, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, but if you haven’t done anything with your audio settings on Xbox then you’ll have to, but it’s really nothing at all they just sounded weird off the bat. I with the volume control and mute button was a little more convenient, but other than that the sound is awesome,m. The directional hearing works great so through the headset you can tell if a player online is behind you or next to you. Despite all the bad reviews I took a risk and I’m pretty happy with it. The mic is detachable and can be moved for convenience. And all my friends say I sound a lot better and clearer. Upgrade from the Xbox one ear headset
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is ok if you just DESPERATELY need a headset and don't need it all day. It's small, just barely fits a normal adults head at full extension and the "pleather" cushions sit ON your ears, not around them, so expect to start sweating with extended use. Also, while these DO have stereo sound, the bass is almost not there at all. Thudding footsteps become light tap shoes, if that makes sense. I would not ever recommend this as a steady headset for anyone but a kid that had never used a GOOD headset. It works....but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon White

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 stars because while it does work, it's such bad quality. Why?? I have the same exact pair from couple years ago that's better than these. I only bought a new pair because my dog chewed the mic on the old one and figured just buy a brand new set.. well my old ones sound better and aren't as sensitive as these ones so I'll just put the new mic on the old one.. it's like it's a knockoff or something. Or turtle beach has really decreased their quality in a couple years
customer_reviews.author: haley smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound, kind of small.
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for my xbox. Sound quality is great no complaints there. When they are on the are decently comfortable. You couldn't go all day with them, but I dont play a lot anyway so they are fine for me. I can hear people talking around me so the noise cancelling isnt perfect. My only actual complaint is that these are kind of small. I have a big head and when I take them off the cords that come from each speaker get caught on my face/neck. Overall happy with the purchase cause it was a solid deal
customer_reviews.author: Kolt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old fanatic of FortNite. It was difficult trying to track down a headset that works well with the Nintendo Switch without spending an astronomical amount. This headset does the job and he’s had no problems with sound or connectivity. Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Headset for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This item was ordered for my Grandson. Shortly after the return time expired, it broke and became unusable. I contacted Amazon for help, as this was a gift for my Grandson that lives approximately 900 miles from me. I cannot travel to see him, so my disappointment was immense when he called and said, “Grammie my headset is not working “. I did email the maker, they were at least kind.
customer_reviews.author: Carol KY

customer_reviews.title: For more than gaming!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I live about 800 miles away from my dad who is very hard of hearing. Hearing on the phone is the hardest for him. My husband uses this headset for his PS4 and recommend that I buy a pair for my dad to use with his phone because of the 3D sound technology. For the first time in a very long time, because of this headset, I was able to have a phone conversation with my dad where he could actually understand what I was saying!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are just okay. They are not noise canceling at all, the mic is lower and more garbled than is ideal for gaming, and the sound quality is meh at best. They don't get too loud so if you're in a room with people doing other things you'll likely hear everything that's going on around you unless you blast the sound. And even then if you're listening to something quieter or monotone it'll be hard to hear. Not bad for the price if you just need whatever works, but I'd suggest waiting and getting something better.
customer_reviews.author: RandomImplosion

customer_reviews.title: Mic does not stay put, falls out, very tight fitting...
customer_reviews.text: The mic keeps falling off while trying to use (it clips in) and its extremely tight fitting, I have a small stature so this would be tough to tolerate on a guy. Nice quality despite the mic falling out and it fitting too snug. *update* the mic no longer stays in place, it falls out and is useless. I am very careful with things, it is simply a bad design or it was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sisu

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my ps4 and i love them. The best headphones I bought in a while. The price is so good. The quality is just amazing. The only thing about them is that in the first few days you will get a headache if you aren’t used to a little heavier headphones but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The headphone themselves fit fine. And the sound quality was good
customer_reviews.text: The headphone themselves fit fine. And the sound quality was good. However.... The "leather" like material for the ear cups make your ears hot. The mic does not work well at all. Even software updated, drivers installed and maxing out and output boosts... It was still hard for friends to hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A Arthur

customer_reviews.title: If you need a inexpensive pair - these will do.
customer_reviews.text: For a $40 gaming head set, they work. I needed to get new pair because my parents puppy chewed up my other one. I'm not a huge gamer/not really competitive but I do like to use headsets when I play. Overall, they work and you get what you pay for. They'll definitively better than average but not great. No "WOW" factor. They also run a little on the small side; therefore, if you have a big head they're going to make your ears and the side of you head hurt a little. Nonetheless - if you need a inexpensive pair - these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This started shorting out before the first month! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphirre

customer_reviews.title: We have had them now for over 3 months and they work great. The only thing that he doesn't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who plays video games daily. We have had them now for over 3 months and they work great. The only thing that he doesn't like is that the cable is made short (from the chin down its only 4-5 inches and then they become one which is where the mic is). It isn't short in length but its short when it becomes one, if that makes any sense. However he loves them and wouldn't replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wish I would have spent the other 60 bucks to get my old headset. These aren't great at blocking out background noise or hearing people in your party. They don't deal to the side of your head very well and the sound quality is lacking. If you've got the extra money, I'd recommend upgrading.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. My 9 year old bought these with his own money and they were broken after one week. He was careful with them, even asked his dad to put up a hook so they wouldn’t be left on the floor. It started out with losing sound on one side, then two days later there was no sound.
customer_reviews.author: J Sho

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months and then stopped!
customer_reviews.text: This headset was great for about two months. After a month it stopped working completely and was beyond the return window so a waste of money. Do not waste your money on this item as there are several other headsets for the same cost that last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have very nice design, are comfortable, and have a good microphone! If you want a microphone to talk to friends online, use this headset! The microphone has an add on muffler to take out the loud sounds whenever you say “S” or “F”. Take off the fluffy part and try to say the words I specified! I lost the Black part, but microphone is still the best without it! Anyways, this is absolutely great and very cheap for these great headphones!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerUser1023

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended
customer_reviews.text: For $20 it works great. The sound and quality is what I would expect for the price I paid. I bought this for my son so we can play online together and I didn’t want to get anything more expensive for a child’s first headset. I tried it just to make sure it worked properly and was surprised at the sound quality of the mic when played back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced Gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. These headphones work great for video game play. We use them for PS4. They allow you to hear background noise like footsteps in depth and to differentiate walking from running. These are a great purchase and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: FlippinPancakes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Still working but my son prefers the wireless ones. We were going through the cheap $20 Afterglow sets about every 3 weeks. Wireless is the way to go. These are his backup and he really likes them, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: jen3

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset as the sound is awesome, it's not too bulky, and it lasts a long time. I've had 2 myself (the first one last 2 years before one side went out) and I've bought them as gifts for others. My friends are always amazed at the sounds I'm able to hear in the games before they do. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ccmike21

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: WOW I didn't even get a chance to attach the mic and try out the full functions with the mic or in game. The sound quality is ATROCIOUS. The sound peaks at any volume with a grainy buzz it is unbearable. Reminds me of the early 2000s simple headphones with the cloth coverings. SO SO NOT EVEN CLOSE TO WHAT I EXPECT OUT OF TURTLE BEACH I have earbuds I buy off of amazon for 9.99 with better sound quality. That alone is an instant return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Turtle Beach!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, and I am thoroughly impressed with how great of quality they are for the price! We had an issue with one of the pairs that the mic stopped working or only worked when it wanted. I reached out to Turtle Beach and they were so friendly and prompt with their responses and quickly helped us send in the broken item and replaced it with a new part! We will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Corlan and Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working after 2 mo
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two months and mic stopped working. Not worth it. And no way to return or replace or get product warranty. :(
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of headphones to serve as a gaming headset and something for meetings. It worked great for like..a day. The headphones themselves are great, I like the shape of the ear piece. It encloses my ears in, and it works great to isolate. A bit tight after prolonged use, but no major complaints. My only major complaint is that the mic refuses to work. It doesn't work on any platform, on a Zoom call, or Discord chat online, or PS4 chat. I'd like to believe it's an isolated fault, but I'm still stuck with a dead mic so, 3-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this one better than the much more expensive one he had, which broke after he got A FINGER tangled in the wire, pulling it just a wee bit too hard, one time. Ridiculous! He says this one has better sound and feel better around his ears
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my son needed/wanted
customer_reviews.text: Ok so maybe "needed" Is the wrong word for teenagers and video games. They don't NEED them. But it's perfect for communicating with his buddies during certain games. Zero glitches so far and he's been using it for months. Once or twice he's dropped it or tossed it (& I screeched at him to be gentler with his electronics) but still zero glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Allison P.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price Great seller
customer_reviews.text: The first one that came didn't seem to work and it had a Short in a wire so we have instructions to send it back. In the meantime the seller already sent me another pair. It works very well and my grandson is very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Imagery

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: after doing some investigation, it is NOT the headphones, as I've tested it on another device and works perfectly fine. I am assuming the problem is with our Xbox controller. Really great headset but it just stopped working one day. Used on Xbox one controller. disappointed in this purchase as I thought it was a bit more than what I was willing to pay for a gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Galpin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after TWO WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Beach is total garbage now. This is my second headset of theirs and not only are they really uncomfortable, but the quality is severely lacking. The jack broke in half while plugged into my XBOX controller! Very disappointing. I'm going back to Sades brand. I've had one for my computer for a long time and it's 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for gaming. My son has enjoyed being able to listen and talk to other players . The noise canceling is pretty good over all but excellent for the price. They are comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be sending back
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to think and I will be calling customer service in the morning. It doesn't seem to detect voice through the Xbox one controller that does support the 3.5mm. I would say it's broken but I found out that it can detect my voice through the mic when using it on my phone. I don't understand. I have even tried multiple remotes and none of them pick up my voice when using it on the Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Shipman

customer_reviews.title: The review's mislead me
customer_reviews.text: Microphone stopped working. I bought on June 4th and it stopped working on August 10th. It was a good mic while it was working (for a low-quality mic), but it didn't last 3 months. If you want a long lasting headset, this is NOT for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hrag Grag

customer_reviews.title: Much better. Like the over the ear for Xbox360
customer_reviews.text: These remind me of the ones for the Xbox 360.. matter a fact I still have those. These are comfortable. Good sound to them. Now I use the part yo u plug into the control and has the bass boost on it. I keep it low tho. All in all.. I gave e it a 4 star.. the fit on your head is good and over your ears is fine. Keep the Mic over your head tho.. as I said it's like the old ones and will blow people's ears out that you are playing with.. ANF you are barely talking
customer_reviews.author: Tree trucker

customer_reviews.title: Possiblity of loosing mic
customer_reviews.text: Love turtle Beach headsets this one is on the cheaper side but the sound is still amazing. Great for a kid that is rough on things. I just wish the mic was attached both kids lost the mic and then the were not able to talk.
customer_reviews.author: Maximo

customer_reviews.title: priced just right
customer_reviews.text: a well-priced headset. they are comfortable but ears tend to get a bit hot. the sound quality is average and the mic audio quality lacks a bit but for the price, these are a decent headset.
customer_reviews.author: drykill_23

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Can tend to make the tops of your ears a little sore after prolonged use! may not be the case for every user. I would speculate that would depend on ear size and sensitivity to certain materials. but all together these are a great set of entry level ear phones for the budding gamer. They are easy to use and have a great sound! the lows are adequate and mids and highs are real good. for the price they are worth it. if you are turned off by a plastic feel these are not for you. but dont let all the plastic fool you! They sound great!
customer_reviews.author: rikki steel

customer_reviews.title: Some Good; Some Bad
customer_reviews.text: Good: + Price + Sound and Mic (when working) + Comfortable Bad: - Issues with Mic after a few months - Cords were not very study (came apart after 6 months just removing from controller) - Cheaper headsets if you want this quality I would recommend "Turtle Beach Stealth 600 Wireless Surround Sound Gaming Headset for Xbox One" Took a bit to get it set up right but has been working well for a long time and no cords to deal with. More $ but worth it to not have to keep re-buying cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: James Good

customer_reviews.title: Love Em.
customer_reviews.text: Had these guys for well over 2 years and still haven't had to replace them. I use them practically every day and sometimes I forget about their wire and accidentally rip the thing out of the output. Yet these guys are still kicking. Super comfortable on the go or just for home use. Good.
customer_reviews.author: secti

customer_reviews.title: Want to have a broken headset? Just slightly tug on the cord!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headset for just over a month, and today I guess I put too much tension on the cord and then all of the sudden my sound cut out. I tried plugging it back in and nothing happened. I have now tried several times nothing has happened. No sound at all. For the amount of time I had this headset I was basically paying a dollar a day to use it. Worst headset ever, durability is absolutely garbage. Do not buy if you want to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed headphones with a microphone for my mmorpg guild activities. These were cheap enough, and I have other Turtle Beach headphones that have worked very well in the past, so I went for it. I can tell that these aren't high quality - but they ARE nice and I DO like them. They are doing their job well and I haven't had any complaints about the sound from my microphone, so it's a success.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't work after less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: The mic was great for the first three weeks. The sound quality was good, and great for the XBox. Unfortunately, the mic stopped working at all. Given the current situation, I'm not able to contact Amazon about returning. Hoping to be able to return once things get back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky, but has good sound.
customer_reviews.text: The hinges squeak each time I put the headset on or take it off, but other than that, no other issues. It has very good sound and is comfortable to wear for long amounts of time.
customer_reviews.author: HCT

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about 1 year then quit working. My brother also bought a pair and had the same results. We’ve moved on to RIG headphones, sound better and more reliable. Turtle beach was the best in 2008, they are definitely slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Attila C

customer_reviews.title: duable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old bought this to play online games. Works great. He can't hear me well when he wears it which I'm sure makes him happy. Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Tuttle Beach headphones never disappoint.. My son's last pair lasted like 4 years. Had the cheaper model and upgraded to these when the mic started cutting in and out (according to him. I think he really just wanted new ones that have the game sounds in them.)
customer_reviews.author: JBurke

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality gaming headset for the price. Turtle Beach makes great headsets. This one really performs. Comfortable and light. It doesn't require batteries as it is powered from the controller. The sound is impressive with good lows and highs. Amazon had it in stock and I received next day. Great deal 👍
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one, first one he was using for soooo long then we got this one and he refused to try any other brand since he loved this one and was doing the job. Very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Wael

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking the ear muffs were bigger than they actually were, and found out it wasn't the case. These constantly hurt my ears after a short hour of use. I guess this was my fault not looking up video reviews. I'll never make that mistake again. I'm just gonna hand these off to someone with smaller ears.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these. We bought them cor xbox play but ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. We bought them cor xbox play but sson found them to be very versatile. We also use them for the Recoil game and they have made that game even more enjoyable for my sons. They usually team up and play against me and since they comminicate through the games chat function. Well constructed and sound is great. When playing Recoil l, my sons tell me that they can hear whatbdirection the bullets are being fired.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... I was a little worried they wouldn't work as good considering they are so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband as a gift and I was a little worried they wouldn't work as good considering they are so cheap, but my husband loves them. He don't use them just for video games. They work great if you want to listen to your music on your phone as well.Great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, durable cables
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset. We have been through multiple headsets mostly due to the cables getting messed up. This headset is lightweight, fits nicely, excellent sound and the mic works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for $$
customer_reviews.text: For this price, these headphones offer exactly what you want in a gaming headset. Crisp voice chat input with 360 degree sound (to hear footsteps/shots coming in any direction). As most consoles do not offer headphones with purchase, these are great for gamers who don't want to spend a fortune on top tier gaming headsets, while still receiving very similar quality. Outside of gaming, I've even now begun using for music with my laptop when other wireless headsets run out of charge and don't feel as if I'm losing a substantial amount of audiophile-type quality. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Santomauro

customer_reviews.title: GO TO TARGET. TWO DEFECTIVE HEADSETS IN A ROW FROM AMZ
customer_reviews.text: The title states the facts: two of these headsets in a row from Amazon failed. The first after a few months and the second one the day it arrived. I'm really starting to think that price matching from Target is the best bet for electronics. I am an Amazon customer since 1997.
customer_reviews.author: Hailwood1965

customer_reviews.title: decent headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: great budget headset for anyone. The cost of these is very reasonable and the sound is nice and clear. good starter for my boy. what you get vs. what you pay for makes these a solid 5 in my book. Only a four because this is my second pair. Im pretty sure my son fell asleep and layed on them though... I'll never know.... definitely worth it for the price though
customer_reviews.author: I buy stuff

customer_reviews.title: Awful sound quality compared to older model turtle beach headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Awful sound compared to the older model turtle beach headphones I bought in the past. The older model also had a much longer cord, and a usb input. I bought 2 pair and i'm returning both. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small?
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium/large head, and these at the largest setting, are pretty tight on the top of my head. I don’t play a lot, but I have to tilt the headset back to get them to fit on my head.. these must be for kids?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Will break after a month!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on August 22, 2019. It’s October 24, 2019 now. The headset stopped working 90% of the time, cutting in and out. Had to switch to mobile chat on the Microsoft app to talk to my party using a different set of headphones. I’m now stuck using chat only headset until I can get a replacement headset.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: They really good to have and smaller than the bigger and more ...
customer_reviews.text: They really good to have and smaller than the bigger and more wired version of there big brother models they also have alot of customization the only thing i would say is that i wish they were a little louder but other than that there great cause when you have them over your head your not hearing anyone and they are really comfortable than most headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kamahl Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and then stopped after less than 2 months. Was past return or exchange and their support tried to blame it on the controller. Not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Arnst

customer_reviews.title: Gamer Approved
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my 8yr old uses for both p.c. and Xbox. Perfect color combo for the Minecraft maniac in your life
customer_reviews.author: Amy Silvey

customer_reviews.title: Do not get!!!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are nice looking but they work for about a month and a half and then stop working. I was very impressed with this item due to it being past the money back guarantee point I wasted my money on faulty headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Breaks soooo easy
customer_reviews.text: It’s feels good and is comfortable but it broke in under 3 months. Whenever I plug it in, it crackes and if I’m in a party with someone they can’t hear me most of the time. I have treated this product well(haven’t thrown it or anything like that) it just doesn’t work and it’s way to expensive for that to happen in only 3 months. I want a refund or a replacement because that is just crazy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Castle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has amazing sound quality, and feels good on the head. The only reason I took one star off is because the microphone went out after about two months of use. But when it did work, it sounded fairly good, definitely useable. But I would not recommend using this for making videos or anything like that. Use a separate microphone so you can get good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Work as described.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and works well. However when you put these on a 13year old playing fortnite it causes them to yell and scream at their friends. And when you tell them to be quiet the headphones make it impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheap movie headphones or work headphones with a microphone for working from home.
customer_reviews.text: Made cheap for turtle beach headphones. My dad uses them for working from home. He loves them. Also he uses them for watching movies on his tablet. He's very happy with them. Just made of a weak plastic. But it's what u get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Budget, lightweight headset
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight gaming headset with detachable microphone. Budget priced. Quality of headset is mediocre, the plastic piece in the band that goes over the head feels like it could break if handled roughly. So far, so good for the price. Comfortable over the ears, best for small to medium ears.
customer_reviews.author: JoyTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: sound quality trying to play call of duty or something with these helps to hear footsteps but the sound overall isn't too good but good for what you pay but you cannot hear your own voice when having these on , i find myself yelling a lot more then i should cause these cancel out outside noise pretty well but don't let me hear myself but overall they're reliable and good for what you pay
customer_reviews.author: George Nava

customer_reviews.title: So easy to break, but they work great
customer_reviews.text: Bro I'mma be real. These are really good to use. They're clear. The mic is good. They fit nice (unless you a bighead). The bass is cool. They feel natural. But they break so easy. I had 4 pairs of these and they're all in the graveyard. This particular pair broke within a week. And I had only used them like 3 times, and wasn't even rough with them. So yeah. I'm not gonna lie I'm gonna buy another pair of Turtle Beach headphones but I'm not buying this model anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneral Huckleby

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Head support is awful the band is practically better off not existing, The sound quality is decent and the surround sound is great but will become uncomfortable to wear within Minutes, Don't recommend for Anyone Teen and Up (Unless you have a smaller sized head)
customer_reviews.author: HaveFate

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach - Recon 50X White Stereo Gaming Headset - PS4 - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Color:White / GreenTake gaming audio and comfort on Xbox One to the next level with the Turtle Beach Recon 50X White gaming headset. The Recon 50X White features Turtle Beach's latest lightweight and comfortable design, with large 40mm over-ear (closed) speakers that let you hear every crisp high and thundering low, plus convenient in-line controls that allow you to quickly and easily adjust Master Volume and Mic Mute. The Recon 50X White also includes an adjustable mic, which can be removed when watching movies and listening to music, and the versatile 3.5mm jack makes it perfect for using with the new Xbox one controller, PS4 Pro and PS4 consoles, as well as PC, Mac and compatible mobile/tablet devices. Speaker frequency response 20Hz to 20kHz. Connections: Xbox One: New Xbox One controller with the 3.5mm jack or via the Headset Audio Controller (sold separately). PS4 Pro and PS4: 3.5mm. PC/Mac: 3.5mm. Mobile/Tablet Devices: 3.5mm. The Turtle Beach Recon 50X White Stereo gaming headset works with Xbox Series X.
feature_bullets: Xbox Wireless: Enjoy a direct connection from your headset to your Xbox One or Xbox Series X console, or compatible Windows 10 PCs (may require Xbox Wireless Adapter for Windows (not included)
Versatile Compatibility: Works great with new Xbox One controller with the 3.5 millimeter jack, Xbox Series X, PS4 Pro and PS4, as well as PC, and Mac
Note: Kindly refer user manual before use
Crystal Clear Chat: An adjustable, high sensitivity mic picks up your voice loud and clear, and can be removed when watching movies or listening to music
High Quality 40mm Speakers : Hear every crisp high and thundering low with these large 40 millimeter speakers
Convenient In line Controls: Convenient in line controls place Master Volume and Mic Mute right at your fingertips
